content: What does CastTarget.prefix_chunk signify? I would have expected the cumulative size of the prefix, but the .size impl suggests the size of a single entry in the prefix array. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/30e49a9ead550551e879af64ba91a0316da1c422/compiler/rustc_target/src/abi/call/mips64.rs#L140 then makes me more confused. Especially because of the comment.
Figured it out. It is the size of the individual prefix chunks.
